PS.content: concepts of alienation/inalienation, madness, belong to an epoch of metaphysics that determines Being as the life of a proper subjectivity > difference laid bare by Artaud, can only be conceived beyond metaphysics, like Heidegger’s difference or Duplicity (opens/conceals truth)

Gii.content: via Heidegger, German fremd relates to High German fram, underway toward, toward elsewhere, toward “encounter w/ what is reserved for it in advance (dem Voraufbehaltenen entgegen)” > allows one to say: stranger does not wander (erre), is not w/out destination; Derrida compares this to Latin extraneus, outside of, extra

OG.content: for Rousseau, in writing the worst is simultaneously the best: total alienation is total reappropriation of presence to itself > Rousseau: “plus de force pour conserver ce qu’on a”
